name: Haste Heist
description: Haste Heist is the stealth game for Action and Puzzle game enthusiasts, approachable for all ages. Easy to pick up and growing in complexity, Haste Heist keeps you on your toes as you tip-toe your way to riches.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 650M/ 1,535MB+ Storage: 288 MB available space
